airframe.name: MOTOR_BENCH
airframe.makefile:
ARCH=lpc21
FLASH_MODE = IAP
MB=motor_bench
main.ARCHDIR = $(ARCH)
main.CFLAGS += -DBOARD_CONFIG=\"boards/olimex_lpc_h2148.h\" -I$(MB) main.CFLAGS += -DPERIPHERALS_AUTO_INIT main.srcs = $(MB)/main_turntable.c main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_LED main.CFLAGS += -DPERIODIC_TASK_PERIOD='SYS_TICS_OF_SEC((1./512.))' -DTIME_LED=1 main.srcs += sys_time.c $(MB)/turntable_systime.c
#main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_USB_SERIAL #main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/usb_ser_hw.c #main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/lpcusb/usbhw_lpc.c $(SRC_ARCH)/lpcusb/usbinit.c #main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/lpcusb/usbcontrol.c $(SRC_ARCH)/lpcusb/usbstdreq.c #main.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=UsbS
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART0 -DUART0_BAUD=B115200 main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mcu_periph/uart_arch.c main.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=Uart0
main.srcs += downlink.c pprz_transport.c
main.CFLAGS += -DMB_TACHO main.srcs += $(MB)/mb_tacho.c
